page.title: 04Lincot Nurseries
page.content: This is one of two nurseries in the block it is owned by Judith Goss and has been open for forty years.Five people are employed full time and there are some part time workers.There are nineteen greenhouses(approx an acre under glass). The plants grown for cut flowers are mainly Chrythanthemums,Sweet Peas, Dahlias,Cornflowers and Scabious.All types of Bedding plants are grown, about fifty varieties for gardens. Vegetable plants are also grown. Lettuce(all the year),Tomatoes and Potatoes are grown to crop.Tomato plants,Runner Beans,Broad Beans, Cabbage,Cucumber,Marrow and Onions are grown for sale. These plants are sold in there own shops in Wellington and Taunton.If there is any surplus this is sold to other shops and flower markets.
